column1: Smoque BBQ////Pulled pork: Delicious and moist. Unlike most BBQ places
column2: they actually serve you pork with the smoke ring. Most BBQ places we've been to (most of them highly-rated in Yelp)
column3: do not serve you any meat with the smoke ring. The smoke ring is a sign that the meat has been smoked properly. Also
column4: most BBQ places do not inject their pulled pork. So
column5: if the BBQ restaurant is not smoking the pulled pork for 6-14 hours
column6: do not add additional rub to the pulled pork
column7: and/or do not inject their pulled pork with marinade
column8: you will end up with bland pork. My husband & I have just smoked pork during July 4th...we will eventually become BBQ Smoking ninjas. :)
